doc:
Mary Martin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Martin 0 Mary Virginia Martin (December 1, 1913 – November 3, 1990) was an American actress, singer, and Broadway star. A muse of Rodgers and Hammerstein, she originated many leading roles over her career including Nellie Forbush in South Pacific and Maria von Trapp in The Sound of Music. She was named a Kennedy Center Honoree in 1989. She was the mother of actor Larry Hagman. Mary_Virginia_Martin ( December_1_,_1913 – November_3_,_1990 ) was an_American_actress , singer , and Broadway_star . A_muse of Rodgers_and_Hammerstein , she originated many_leading_roles over her_career including Nellie_Forbush in South_Pacific and Maria_von_Trapp in The_Sound of Music . She was_named a_Kennedy_Center_Honoree in 1989 . She was the_mother of actor_Larry_Hagman .
